name: Mr. Winston
quote: I may be drunk, Miss, but in the morning I will be sober and you will still be ugly.

name: Amanda E.
quote: Every day is a fresh start. But just to be clear, I’m going back to bed after this one.

name: Jessi J.
quote: Older people shouldn't eat health food, they need all the preservatives they can get.

name: Emily C.
quote: The first 5 days after the weekend are always the hardest.

name: Dr. Pepper
quote: I cook with wine, sometimes I even add it to the food.

name: The Jake
quote: I could definitely be a morning person… if morning started at noon.
